pages.text: The $(item)Flesh of the Lamb$() is a dying memory of a dead sacrifice.$(br)Even though it is dead, a power still lingers in the memory.$(br)This power is a power of ice.
This memory is created by infusing $(l:alchemy/entry_thoughts_battling)Battling Thoughts$() with Ice and Body Essence in an $(l:manipulation/entry_basin)Infusion Basin$().
